callback_with_context.context_function_id: CcoCampaignRelationshipMember(CompatibilityInForce : GetIfElse(IsPendingUnitExchange, CompatibilityWithCharacters(PendingUnitExchangeCharacterList), this.CompatibilityInForce), CompatibilityInProvince : 0, CompatibilityWithPosts : 0, CompatibilityInRegion : GetIfElse(IsPendingUnitExchange, 0, this.CompatibilityInRegion))

(IsConvalescing && IsConvalescingWithWound == false && IsAlive && (ConvalescingCause != "UNDERCOVER_CHARACTER_DISCOVERED" || (ConvalescingCause == "UNDERCOVER_CHARACTER_DISCOVERED" && UndercoverInterfaceContext.UndercoverCharacterContext.TargetFactionContext != PlayersFaction)) && (InPostBattle == false || StoredContext("CcoCampaignPostBattleForce").HaveForceRetreatedThisTurn == false) )

convalescing_dead.comment: Not used yet, would need campaign code

convalescing_timer.componentleveltooltip: This Character is wounded and will recover in the indicated number of Seasons

convalescing_wounded.comment: Not used yet, would need campaign code

individual_kills.componentleveltooltip: The number of entities this unit has killed in this battle.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | CcoCharacterDisplay => "ui/characters/" + StillImagePath + "/unitcards/" + CardImage + ".png" | ( CcoUnitDetails && IsCharacter == false ) => UnitRecordContext.IconPath | CcoMainUnitRecord => IconPath | self.ImagePath(0)
